data.name: How to speed up your product with videos & streaming
data.summary:
What you'll learn at this meetup?
Evolution of video & why thereâ€™s a rapid increase in its usage
Why you need to stop viewing videos only as marketing & instead look at them as the core product
Psychological barriers to video development and how Vibhor overcame them
5 ways you can use videos to speed up your product
Examples on:

How Youtube engages with its creators using videos
How Mindvalley is pioneering its video-based education platform using YouTube
Individuals who used YouTube to make million-dollar products
data.speakers: Vibhor Saxena, Product Manager, Channel Memberships at YouTube
